title: Commanding Heights : Ricardo Lagos | on PBS

quotes: Milton Friedman's ideas, they came to Chile through the Chicago School, and the Chicago School was working in Chile with the Catholic University during the '60s and the '70s.
Now, what happened lately is that together with the period of Pinochet, particularly in the '80s, the world as we knew it was coming to an end.

quotes: But when you go to democracy, then I think that the coalition that was able to perform this transition -- I was minister of education during those days -- has a tremendous challenge.
